description: Update size chart of item. The API will be sunset on 2024.12.27, please switch to using v2.product.add_item and v2.product.update_item to set and update the size chart for product as soon as possible.

query.name: size_chart
query.description: ID of size chart image. Only CB sellers are support to "size_chart" field, for local sellers please use "size_chart_id" field. If you want to remove the size chart image of the item, please pass the "size_chart" field empty.

query.name: size_chart_id
query.description: ID of new size chart. Only local sellers are support to "size_chart_id" field, for CB sellers please use "size_chart" field. If you want to remove the new size chart of the item, please pass the "size_chart_id" field as 0.

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier of the API request for error tracking.

schema.name: failed_reason
schema.sample: Can't unlist item when item is under promotion
